oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Old Hickory Church of Christ, 2001 February
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Old Hickory Church of Christ located at 1001 Hadley Avenue in Old Hickory, Tennessee. This church is situated in the heart of Historic Old Hickory Village. According to the survey the building was constructed in 1940. The foundation cement block that has been plastered. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is gabled. Additions have been built onto the original structure. Three arched windows on the front facade have been bricked in. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Old Hickory Church of Christ (Old Hickory, Tenn.)
